text: Michael Shumway "Mike" Lee (born June 4, 1971) is an American politician and lawyer who is the senior United States Senator from Utah. A member of the Republican Party, Lee has served in the U.S. Senate since January 3, 2011. Lee tested positive for COVID-19 on October 1, 2020. ==References== ==Other websites== * Senator Mike Lee official U.S. Senate website * Mike Lee for Senate * * Category:1971 births Category:Living people Category:United States senators from Utah Category:People from Mesa, Arizona Category:Politicians from Arizona Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Mike Lee
